sources.title: No Man's Law 1927 Colorized
sources.description: From IMDB: Two thugs plot to kill an old miner to get his claim, but one of them lusts after his beautiful daughter and wants her first. https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0018204 Silent Western starring Oliver Hardy as the ruthless one-eyed bandit (!), and Rex the Wonder Horse. Colorized using DeOldify and Avidemux's Old Photo filter. No soundtrack. (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
